mapper.select: select pp.plan_id, pp.name, pi.indica_id from prod_plan pp left outer join prod_indica pi on pp.plan_id = pi.plan_id where pi.indica_id is null and pp.fg != 'CANCEL'

select ppd.plan_deta_id as plan_deta_id, p.prdt_nm as prdt_nm, ppd.qy as qy, ppd.prod_dcnt as prod_dcnt from prod_plan_deta ppd join prdt p on ppd.prdt_id = p.prdt_id where ppd.plan_id = #{planId} order by ppd.priort
select l.line_id as line_id from prod_plan_deta ppd join line l on ppd.prdt_id = l.prdt_id where ppd.plan_deta_id = #{planDetaId} group by l.line_id

select l.prdt_id as prdt_id, b.rwmatr_id as rwmatr_id, r.nm as nm, (b.qy*#{qy}/10) as qy, ppd.plan_deta_id as plan_deta_id from prdt p join line l on p.prdt_id = l.prdt_id join bom b on p.prdt_id = b.prdt_id join rwmatr r on b.rwmatr_id = r.rwmatr_id join prod_plan_deta ppd on p.prdt_id = ppd.prdt_id where l.line_id = #{lineId} and ppd.plan_deta_id = #{planDetaId} group by l.prdt_id, b.rwmatr_id, r.nm, b.qy, ppd.plan_deta_id order by b.rwmatr_id
select rs.lot_no as lotNo, rs.qy as qy, trunc(rs.expdate) as expdate from rwmatr rw join rwmatr_stc rs on rw.rwmatr_id = rs.rwmatr_id where rw.rwmatr_id = #{rwmatrId} ORDER BY rs.expdate asc
mapper.insert:
select 'PID-' || to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd') || '-' || lpad(nvl2(substr(max(indica_deta_id),14),(substr(max(indica_deta_id),14)+1), 1), 3, '0') as indica_deta_id from prod_indica_deta where substr(indica_deta_id,5,8) = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyyMMdd')
insert into prod_indica_deta (indica_deta_id, indica_id, qy, line_id, ord, indica_dt, remk) values (#{indicaDetaId}, (select indica_id from prod_indica where plan_deta_id = #{planDetaId}), #{qy}, #{lineId}, #{ord}, #{indicaDt}, #{remk} )
